title: Star Guardian Icon

replies.body: YES Jinx I main jinx too <3 I got the skin too <3

There is only a single icon for taking the quiz!  You will receive the icon akin to the silhouette of the [star guardian ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/star-guardian-2016)site, regardless of who you get on your quiz.  Hope that helps clear things up!
